properties.description: All are welcome, we are totally inclusive. Thursday we have free giveaways for over 65's before 1pm. Maybe a hot drink, a muffin, bowl of soup - Watch the posters to see what's coming up!

properties.description: We mainly cater for Carers and the person's they care for, but we welcome all and are children and dog friendly. We have free Laptops available for the public to use. Board games, Coloring books and provide support and information.

properties.description: We cater for people of all ages during our sessions, we have good disabled access and disabled toilets too. We have a range of comfy seating, plenty of toys for babies and toddlers, free hot/cold drinks and biscuits, sometimes even cake!
